00024 RDK2_FACTORY(RPoint2d);

00026 RPoint2d::RPoint2d(double x, double y ) 
00027     : RDK2::Geometry::Point2d(x, y) { }
00028 
00029 RDK2::Object* RPoint2d::clone() const
00030 {
00031     return new RPoint2d(*this);
00032 }
00033 
00034 void RPoint2d::read(RDK2::Serialization::Reader*r) 
00035     throw (RDK2::Serialization::ReadingException) 
00036 {
00037     r->startReading(getClassName());
00038         x = r->read_f64();
00039         y = r->read_f64();
00040     r->doneReading();
00041 }
00042 
00043 void RPoint2d::write(RDK2::Serialization::Writer*w) const
00044     throw (RDK2::Serialization::WritingException) 
00045 {
00046     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00047         w->write_f64(x);
00048         w->write_f64(y);
00049     w->doneWriting();
00050 }
